Name: TeamSpeak 3
Description:
Enables basic interactions with TeamSpeak 3 using the ClientQuery plugin.

Supported interactions:
* switch channel
* mute
* deafen
* toggle away status

To use this plugin, first install the ClientQuery plugin in TeamSpeak 3, then copy the API key it generates to the plugin settings in Stream Deck.

me.mehlinger.teamspeak3.switch-channel.Name: Switch Channel
me.mehlinger.teamspeak3.switch-channel.Tooltip: Switch to a specific TeamSpeak 3 channel

Localization.ApiKeyDescription: Generate an API key in TeamSpeak 3: Tools → Options → Addons → ClientQuery → Settings.
Localization.ChannelNameDescription: Enter the exact name of the TeamSpeak channel you want to switch to when this button is pressed.
Localization.ChannelPasswordDescription: Enter the channel password if the channel is password-protected.
